title: What is the relationship between computer science and information communications technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Computer science teaches the fundamental principles of computation, programming languages, how to program, algorithms & data structures, and many more things. Information and communications technology - Wikipedia is an attempt to merge traditional IT with audio-visual and other forms of communication. At its heart is the use of a single network connection to provide a user with all of their communications services, from telephone to TV to email and instant messaging plus of course all sorts of web services. ICT, in other words, is an application of CS plus networking hardware in an IT context.

information communication technology focuses more on new technology and get you trained for the current industry. Computer science gets you ready to be an engineer, gets you ready to break a large problem, distribute it among team and engineer your solution.
